about.title: About
about.intro: Atlas composer is an interactive tool for visualizing countries with geographically-scattered territories using composite projections.

why.title: Why this tool?
why.description: Displaying a country and its distant territories on the same map is a cartographic challenge. How do you show regions separated by thousands of kilometers while maintaining visual coherence? This tool explores different solutions using composite projections, similar to how the Albers USA projection displays Alaska and Hawaii alongside the continental United States.

features.compositeExisting: Apply pre-configured composite projections from d3-composite-projections
features.compositeCustom: Build custom layouts by positioning each territory individually

features.unified: Display all territories in a single global projection
